summary.Title: Sales Agent for the Nordic market (esp. Sweden and Denmark), Malmø/Copenhagen

Address.AddressLine: Polígono Industrial Can Cuyás, Calle A - Naves 17-18-19
Polígono Industrial Can Cuyás, Calle A - Naves 17-18-19

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Sales Agent for the Nordic market (esp. Sweden and Denmark), Malmø/Copenhagen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
MYTPLAST S.A., Montcada i Reixac (Barcelona), Spain, is looking for a sales agent for the Nordic market, especially in Sweden and Denmark, with possible contacts in Norway and Finland. You will join a dynamic and growing team.

From our factory and head office in Barcelona, Spain we will support you with a series of tools to help you achieve your goals:

  • Direct and continuous contact with the export manager (middle management).
  • A database with some clients already active in your area + references of our multinational clients in other countries.
  • 10 - 20 quality visits (video calls) per month organised by our internal sales team for you in your area.
  • Monthly emailings to all current and potential customers in our database.
  • Support on your visits to trade fairs.
  • We will pass on to you all the contacts that come through our website in your area.
  • Repetition of 80% of annual orders.
  • Initial training.

We will expect to see sales results from you based on:

  • A minimum of 20 visits / video calls per month
  • A minimum of 10 quotations per month
  • Visit at least 1 trade fair per year
  • Active search for new clients in your area
  • Positive attitude and proactivity

PROFILE OF EMPLOYEE: 

In Mytplast, we have been helping our clients since 1980 customers to present their products with the highest quality. We are the essential support for the marketing teams of any company that wants to care for and promote its image.

Mytplast creates and manufactures customized solution for the presentation of catalogs, documents and samples. All these years we have made materials for presentations of all kinds of products and professional sectors. Since our beginnings, we have looked for an added value that differentiates us in the market and we have achieved it through the innovation in our products.

We are specialized in the creation of material for presentation of products of sectors as: ceramics, marble, stone, synthetic floors, electrical components, switches, lighting, mortar, acrylic paints, insulation, wood, parquets, furniture.

SKILLS:     

  • Minimum of 2 years’ experience in sales
  • Excellent verbal and written communications skills
  • High level of initiative and team-work
  • Excellent communication on the phone
  • Very good level of Swedish / Danish and good level of English

Contract:

contract for self-employed

Salary:

  • 1st year - commissions for each visit + quotation (up to 500€/month)
  • Always - commissions between 10% and 6% for each order taken depending on the customer's origin
  • Opportunity to join and grow in a dynamic multinational team of professionals
  • Accommodation and flight to Barcelona paid on training days (normally 3 days)

More information:

Sasha Karnilovich, export@mytplast.com, +34 637 472 463

www.mytplast.com

How to apply?

send your application to Sasha Karnilovich at export@mytplast.com as soon as possible.

(from EURES Barcelona)
